subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Petr Prucha scored twice Saturday night to help the Rangers beat the Florida Panthers, 3-2, in San Juan, P.R. It was the first N.H.L. exhibition game played in the Caribbean.
snippet: Petr Prucha scored twice Saturday night to help the Rangers beat the Florida Panthers, 3-2, in San Juan, P.R. It was the first N.H.L. exhibition game played in the Caribbean.
